Title: Finding bugs in source code using commonly available development metadata
Published: 8th Workshop on Cyber Security Experimentation and Test (CSET 15)
Purpose: To identify previously unknown vulnerabilities automatically using information gathered from development metadata
Elements_risk_assessment: they manually verified the results so it's so Good!
UseOF-SZZ: Identifying the changesets that have injected a particular bug
Summary: This paper provides a method for leveraging development metadata to find bugs that would otherwise be difficult to find using standard static analysis tools
Outcome: It is possible to identify new vulnerabilities that are similar to previously reported vulnerabilities within that application
